content: these socks are knit from the cuff down and have a simple colorwork pattern at the cuff and at the toes the heel is constructed with a heel flap and a gusset the socks are knit with fingering weight sock yarn 425m/100g used for the ones in the example is opal 4ply sock yarn in the colors 5189 camel and 5184 olive you need approx 50g/215m of the main color and 25-30g/~115m of the contrasting color gauge 30 sts per 10cm dpns or circular needles in 2 5mm finished size foot circumference s 17 5 cm stretches to 21 cm 8 2 in 56 sts m 20 cm stretches to 24 cm 9 4 in 64 sts l 23 cm stretches to 27 cm 10 6 in 72 sts the length can be adjusted individually
